events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't been updated either.
System has categorized the issue as a Delivery Delay based on keywords in the customer's initial message.
The support agent assigned to handle this case is Sarah from the Shipping Support team.
Hello! I'm Sarah from Customer Support. I understand your order hasn't arrived yet and I'll do my best to help.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have so I can investigate the delay?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The tracking number is not showing any new updates since last week.
I've checked with the shipping carrier and they reported a delay due to weather issues. We expect delivery in 3-4 days and I can offer a shipping refund for the inconvenience.
Thank you for the update and the refund offer. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the package soon.
The shipping refund has been processed and I confirm your order will be delivered shortly. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that your order has been delivered and you are satisfied with the resolution provided.
Since the delivery was completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
